title: Want for Nothing in this Dreamy Island Paradise With All-Inclusive Dining
description: Experience the ultimate all-inclusive tropical island escape, staying in a traditional thatched beachfront bure at Yasawa Island Resort & Spa. Includes all your gourmet meals served either in the restaurant, poolside or on the beachfront, non-alcoholic drinks including from the complimentary in-room mini-bar, indulgent daily spa treatments, activities, tours and trips such as a Blue Lagoon Cave excursion, kayaking and stand-up paddleboarding, PLUS a FJD600 credit towards return transfers between Nadi Airport and the island on select dates.

title: Fiji Five-Star Private Island Paradise with All-Inclusive Dining & Daily Spa Treatments
description:
Nestled amid Fiji's magical Yasawa Islands, off the coast of Nadi, is Yasawa Island Resort & Spa. This tranquil spot is home to 11 private beaches, where quiet moments on the sugar-fine sands await and waters shimmer in endless shades of blue.

An adults-only paradise (except during select Family Weeks), this private five-star resort hosts no more than 40 guests at a time. A collection of just 18 luxe, traditionally thatched bures is hidden among the luscious tropical greenery, each mere moments from the silky white-sand beachfront. You might be inclined to dedicate all your time to the champagne shores' endless splendour, but this resort has plenty to offer beyond the stunning backdrop. Lose yourself in nature's wonderland amid fish-filled coral reefs, explore the iconic Blue Lagoon Caves, gain a fascinating insight into local culture with a kava ceremony, participate in cooking demonstrations or lounge beside the palm-fringed pool and find a moment of well-deserved 'me' time.

title: Fiji Private Island Paradise with All-Inclusive Dining, Daily Spa Treatments & FJ$600 Flight Credit
description:
Nestled amid Fiji's magical Yasawa Islands off the coast of Nadi is Yasawa Island Resort & Spa, home to 11 private beaches where quiet moments on the sugar-fine sands with someone special await.

An adults-only paradise (except during select Family Weeks), this private resort hosts no more than 40 guests at a time and features just 18 luxury bures hidden among the luscious tropical greenery, each mere moments from silky white-sand beachfront. You might be inclined to dedicate all your time to the champagne shores' endless splendour, but this resort has plenty to offer beyond the stunning backdrop. Snorkel coral reefs, explore the iconic Blue Lagoon Caves, gain a fascinating insight into local culture with a kava ceremony, participate in cooking demonstrations or lounge beside the palm-fringed pool.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Indulge with daily all-inclusive à la carte breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks
- Enjoy unlimited non-alcoholic drinks throughout your stay, including coffee, tea, juice and mocktails
- Let your cares melt away with a daily 50-minute spa treatment per adult at Baravi Spa
- Enjoy FJ$600 credit per package to be used towards a return airplane transfer for two (select dates)
- Make a splash in the crystal-clear water with complimentary motorised and non-motorised watersport equipment hire
- Discover a welcome bottle of wine and a fruit basket in your bure on arrival

**This deal has NO peak surcharges:** Travel anytime for the same great price.

**Extended Stay Bonus:** Stay seven or eight nights in paradise and receive FJ$200 resort credit per bure, per stay, or stay nine nights or more and enjoy FJ$250 per bure, per stay.

**Deluxe Beachfront Upgrade:** Enjoy plenty of space to unwind in a 135sqm Deluxe Beachfront Bure, offering ocean panoramas, a split-level design for separate living and sleeping areas, and a private deck that opens right onto the pristine beachfront.

**Family Weeks:** The resort permits guests aged 15 years and under only on select dates, see Fine Print for details.

**Book with 100% Confidence:** Right up until 14 days before check-in you can enjoy unlimited, free date changes, or cancel and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other Limited Time Lux Exclusive accommodation, tour or cruise offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.

title: All-Inclusive Fiji Island Paradise with Daily Massages & FJ$600 Flight Credit
description:
Escape to Yasawa Island Resort & Spa, part of Fiji's magical Yasawa Islands, home to 18 luxury bures all just steps from 11 private beaches. Soak up the sunrise and sunset from your Beachfront Bure, dine on sumptuous meals, relax with spa treatments and experience the pinnacle of luxury at this island oasis.

Immerse yourself in this secluded oasis and be rewarded with all-inclusive dining (daily à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner) and non-alcoholic drinks served by the poolside, at the onsite restaurant or on the beach, overlooking the glittering South Pacific Ocean. Unwind with a daily 50-minute spa treatment per adult, daily watersports, activities and tours, a welcome bottle of white house wine and fruit basket in-bure on arrival, and a FJ$600 credit per bure towards return flights from Nadi to Yasawa on specific dates (see Fine Print for details).

**Extended stay bonus:** Extend your stay in paradise to seven nights and receive FJ$200 resort credit per bure, per stay, or upgrade to a nine-night stay and enjoy FJ$250 per bure, per stay.

**This deal has NO surcharges**: Travel anytime for the same great price.

title: Fiji Five-Star Private Island Paradise with All-Inclusive Dining & FJ$400 Spa Credit
description:
Nestled amid Fiji's magical Yasawa Islands - between countless sun-drenched beaches and legendary diving spots - rests remote paradise Yasawa Island Resort & Spa. Escape reality and discover the far-flung Fiji of your dreams, home to 11 private beaches, where waters shimmer in endless shades of blue and quiet moments on the warm, white sands await. This private five-star resort hosts no more than 40 guests at a time in a collection of 18 luxe, traditionally thatched bures, hidden among the luscious tropical greenery.

description:

title: All-Inclusive Island Escape in Fiji
description: Experience the ultimate all-inclusive tropical island escape with six nights staying in a traditionally thatched beachfront bure at Yasawa Island Resort & Spa. Includes all your gourmet meals, non-alcoholic beverages, spa treatments, a Blue Lagoon caves excursion, a visit to a local village, picnic on one of Yasawa’s 11 private beaches, complimentary snorkeling, kayaking, guided walks and catamaran use, complimentary Wi-Fi in the main areas and more.
offer_address: Yasawa Island Resort & Spa, Yasawa Island, Fiji

title: Boutique Fiji Island Paradise Surrounded By 11 Private Beaches
description:
Savour unique seclusion on one of Yasawa Island’s remote islets at the exclusive Yasawa Island Resort & Spa, moments from 11 private beaches, where quiet moments on the sugar-fine sands with someone special await.

An adults-only paradise just off the coast of Nadi, this private resort welcomes less than 50 guests at any one time, with just 18 luxury bures hidden among the luscious tropical greenery, each mere moments from silky white-sand beachfront. You might be inclined to dedicate all your time to the champagne shores' endless splendour, but this resort has plenty to offer beyond the stunning backdrop. Snorkel coral reefs, explore the iconic Blue Lagoon Caves (entry fee applies), gain a fascinating insight into local culture with a kava ceremony or participate in cooking demonstrations.
